name: Talking Stitch
description:
Talking stitch... a game where you talk to stitch or take care of him :)

how to play: just use your mouse to click or play in mobile to tap on the stuff :/

thanks to the real game. talking ben

i like the idea about the game so i made it in scratch instead it's stitch.

download the game in mobile if you haven't! Talking Ben the Dog - Apps on Google Play
